functions.name: healthcare_workforce_authorization_supervision
functions.description: Checks workforce authorization and supervision for healthcare.

functions.name: healthcare_workforce_member_terminate_access
functions.description: Checks if workforce member access is terminated as required.

functions.name: healthcare_ephi_access_authorization_consistency
functions.description: Checks consistency of ePHI access authorization.

functions.name: healthcare_ehri_logging_monitoring_mechanism
functions.description: Checks logging and monitoring mechanisms for EHRI.

functions.name: healthcare_protect_electronic_phi_from_alteration_destruction
functions.description: Checks protection of electronic PHI from alteration or destruction.

functions.name: healthcare_apis_workforce_ephi_access_control
functions.description: Checks workforce ePHI access control for healthcare APIs.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Healthcare API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
